https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qg7yahayxj44CMBQcdN7b4JvXhM.jpg Dickson Hughes and Richard Stapley, two young composers and romantic partners, are caught in the web of silent film star Gloria Swanson when she hires them to write a musical version of Sunset Boulevard, her 1950 film directed by Billy Wilder. Boulevard! A Hollywood Story
